SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.data

Class MockProfileRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.data.MockProfileRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProfileRepository
public class MockProfileRepository extends Object implements ProfileRepository
A mock version of FirebaseRepository Repository for local unit testing. It keeps data in memory and does not use Firebase.

  • Nested Class Summary
